---
title: "텍스트마이닝 2번"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
```


```{r}
data <- read_xlsx("seoul.xlsx")

name <- data$업소명

food <- grep("분식", name, value = TRUE)
num <- grep("\\d", name, value = TRUE)
hair <- grep("헤어", name, value = TRUE)
salon <- grep("미용실", name, value = TRUE)

kable(food)
kable(num)
kable(hair)
kable(salon)

length(food)
length(num)
length(hair)
length(salon)
```
